Texts.Eng: <target> is always reliable, and so are you! Thank you for your assistance.
Texts.Rus: <target> всегда надёж<target.pronoun.verb2Ending>, как и ты! Спасибо за помощь.

Texts.Eng: Firssst, Floran needs you to ^green;get a shiny ^orange;<item>. ^white;Floran thinksss ^orange;<target> ^green;will have one.
Texts.Rus: Сссначала, Флорану нужно, чтобы ты ^green;добыл<player.pronoun.verbEnding> блестяшшшку — ^orange;<item>. ^white;Флоран думает, что ^orange;<target> ^green;как раз имеет её.

Texts.Eng: First ^green;I shall need one ^orange;<item>^white;, and I know that ^orange;<target>^white; currently owns one. ^green;Can you ask <target.pronoun.object> to give it to us?
Texts.Rus: Сначала,  ^green;мне нужно ^orange;<item>^white;, и я знаю, что ^orange;<target>^white; как раз имеет такое. ^green;Можешь попросить <target.pronoun.reflexive> отдать это нам?

Texts.Eng: For the next part, Floran needss a nice ^orange;<item>. ^white;Floran heard that ^orange;<target> ^white;had one. ^green;You should ask <target.pronoun.object> for it.
Texts.Rus: Далее, Флорану требуется ^orange;кое-что. ^white;И Флоран слышшшал, что ^orange;<target> ^white;имеет такое. ^green;Тебе стоит попросить <target.pronoun.reflexive> отдать <item> нам.

Texts.Eng: I am lucky to have friends like you and <target> to help me out!
Texts.Rus: А мне повезло иметь таких друзей как <target> и тебя!

Texts.Eng: I knew that <target> would be willing to help me. Thank you for your assistance!
Texts.Rus: Я знал<questGiver.pronoun.verbEnding>, что <target> не откажется помочь. Спасибо за помощь.

Texts.Eng: Next, Floran heard that ^orange;<target> ^white;hass a nice ^orange;<item>. ^white;Could you ^green;collect it for Floran^white;, pleasse?
Texts.Rus: Дальше, Флоран слышал, что ^orange;<target> ^white;заполучил<target.pronoun.verbEnding> ^orange;<item>. ^white;Можешь ^green;взять это для Флорана^white;?

Texts.Eng: Next, I need you to ^green;retreive my ^orange;<item>^white;. I loaned it to ^orange;<target>^white; last week, ^green;could you ask for it back?^white;  We're going to need it for the next phase of my plan.

Next, ^green;I have need of ^orange;<target>'s <item>^white;. I'm positive that if you asked <target.pronoun.object> nicely, <target.pronoun.subject>'d give it to us. ^green;You should speak to <target.pronoun.object>.
Now I'll need you to get one ^orange;<item>. <target>^white; has the biggest collection around; if you ^green;ask nicely^white; I'm sure <target.pronoun.subject> wouldn't mind parting with just one.
Perfect! Floran has plansss for this <item>.
Perfect, I'll have to give <target> my thanks. This is exactly what we need.
Texts.Rus: Идеально, надо сказать спасибо <target>. Это как раз то что нам нужно.

Texts.Eng: Thanks for getting what we needed from <target>. Now to move things forward.
Texts.Rus: Спасибо, что взяли то,что мне нужно у <target>. А сейчас, пора двигаться дальше.

Texts.Eng: Thanksss! Floran knew <target> wouldn't mind.
Thanksss! Floran thinks we'll need this <item> more than <target> does.
That is one good looking <item>. Thanks for picking this up.
The first thing I'll need is one ^orange;<item>.^white; ^orange;<target>^white; has an extra one, and owes me a favor. ^green;Could you run over to <target.pronoun.object> and pick it up?
This <item> is just what I need - <target> is so kind to have provided it. And you're so kind for fetching it!
To begin we'll need one ^orange;<item>.^white; I know ^orange;<target>^white; got a new one recently, ^green;you should ask if we can use it.
To sstart, Floran needs a shiny ^orange;<item> ^green;from ^orange;<target>. ^green;Go asssk <target.pronoun.object> for one.
You brought Floran the <item>! <target> won't misss it.
You got the <item> from <target>, excellent work! This next step would have been tough without it.
Texts.Rus: Ты получил<player.pronoun.verbEnding> <item> от <target>, отличная работа! Без этого, мы бы не перешли к следующему шагу.

Texts.Eng: ^green;I am going to need one ^orange;<item>^white;, I know that ^orange;<target>^white; owns one. ^green;I am sure <target.pronoun.subject>'ll give it to me if you ask.
^green;I need one ^orange;<item> and know that ^orange;<target> has one. I am sure you could ^green;procure it for me if you asked <target.pronoun.object> nicely.
